name: Eternal Shroud
description: A pristine hood that feeds upon strife to empower its owner.

abilities.name: Shroud
abilities.description: Restores mana based on the incoming enemy spell damage value before reductions.
notes: Considers spell damage of all damage types (before reductions), excluding HP Removal sources.

abilities.name: Eternal Endurance
abilities.description: Grants base magic resistance bonus stacks per certain amount of incoming magical damage received.
notes: Each stack places a new buff on the wielder, with each buff duration independent of the other.

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats: 220 health and 1 health regeneration.
10 main attack damage to Strength heroes.
4.5 main attack damage to universal heroes.
Bonuses from multiple Eternal Shrouds, including Shroud, do not stack.
Stacks multiplicatively with other magic resistance sources.
Increases most heroes' magic resistance to 40%.
With the magic resistance bonus from this source, every 10 points of intelligence further increases the total magic resistance by 0.8%.
